description:
This module seeks to introduce data standards, its sources (traditional and contemporary) and applications in healthcare. Some important standards covered here include SNOMED, ICD9\10, HL7, OMOP and other international standards.

Features of healthcare databases and processing of data would be covered. Concepts in databases and data mapping would be demonstrated in practice.
title: Medical Data and Data Processing
faculty: Yong Loo Lin Sch of Medicine
